articles.author: Steve Benen
articles.title: Iraq calls on US to make withdrawal...
articles.description: I'd say "friction" is inevitable when one country asks another to leave, and the response is, "No."
articles.content: There are roughly 50,000 American troops in the Middle East – with several thousand more on the way – 6,000 of whom are in Iraq. This past weekend, the Iraqi parliament voted unanimously to expel U.S. forces from Iraqi soil, a vote that came in response to th… [+2620 chars]

articles.author: MPX
articles.title: Morning Joe 1/10/20
articles.description: Joe and Mika discuss the big news of the day.

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Pelosi to send articles of impeachment to Senate as soon as next week
articles.description:
House Speaker Nancy Pelosi, D-Calif., said in a letter to Democratic lawmakers on Friday that she will consult with her members on Tuesday as she announced steps to send the articles of impeachment to the Senate.
The letter also said that the House next week …

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: 'My faith is in people,' says 'Two Popes' co-star
articles.description: Two-time Tony Award winner Jonathan Pryce joins Morning Joe to discuss playing Pope Francis in the new Netflix film 'The Two Popes'.

articles.author: Steve Benen
articles.title: Friday's Campaign Round-Up, 1.10.20
articles.description: Today's installment of campaign-related news items from across the country.
articles.content:
Today’s installment of campaign-related news items from across the country.
* The two latest Fox News polls show former Vice President Joe Biden ahead in two early nominating states, leading the Democratic field in South Carolina with 36% support, well ahead… [+1660 chars]

articles.author: Steve Benen
articles.title: Trump reportedly connected impeachment trial, Soleimani airstrike
articles.description: Trump was impeached for putting political interests above national security interests. It'd be amazing if did the same thing during the impeachment process.
articles.content: There’s no shortage of concerns about why, exactly, Donald Trump risked a war by approving an airstrike that killed Iranian Gen. Qassem Soleimani. There is, however, one overarching concern: it’s hard not to wonder whether the American president, concerned ab… [+1996 chars]

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Pompeo: We shared 'all of the intelligence' on Soleimani with Congress
articles.description: Secretary of State Mike Pompeo claimed that "all of the intelligence" the administration had on an imminent threat from Iranian general Qassem Soleimani was shared with Congress.

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Pompeo and Mnuchin announce additional sanctions against Iran
articles.description: Secretary of State Mike Pompeo and Treasury Secretary Steve Mnuchin announced that new sanctions will be imposed against Iran after missiles were launched at bases in Iraq where U.S. troops were stationed.

articles.author: Steve Benen
articles.title: Trump falsely claims credit for lower cancer rates, faces pushback
articles.description: Trump really ought to think twice before tying his presidency to every development that happens while he's in office.
articles.content:
In 2017, there were no recorded accidental deaths in U.S. commercial passenger jets. Almost immediately after that information reached the public, Donald Trump said he wanted Americans to give him credit for the developments.
It was an early reminder: if som… [+2591 chars]

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Scaramucci: Trump could never be Obama or Tillerson
articles.description: Fmr. WH Communications Director Anthony Scaramucci and Chair of the Libertarian Party, Nick Sarwark, join Morning Joe to discuss the latest jobs report, the communications strategy and why Trump is obsessed with Barack Obama.

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Pelosi: 'Perhaps we'll see' impeachment articles announcement today
articles.description: Garrett Haake reports from Capitol Hill where Nancy Pelosi told reporters that she would be communicating with her members today, and "perhaps we'll see" an announcement about when she would send the articles of impeachment to the Senate today.

articles.author: MSNBC.com
articles.title: Iran denies shooting down plane, accuses U.S. of adding 'insult to injury' of bereaved
articles.description: Iran has strongly denied that a Ukraine International Airlines jetliner that crashed shortly after takeoff from Tehran earlier this week, killing 176 people, was downed by an Iranian missile launched by mistake. Multiple officials told NBC News that U.S. inte…

articles.author: Steve Benen
articles.title: Trump lawyers try, fail to make E. Jean Carroll's lawsuit go away
articles.description: Donald Trump's lawyers recently tried to make E. Jean Carroll's defamation lawsuit go away. Those efforts are off to a bad start.
articles.content:
Donald Trump’s lawyers recently tried to make E. Jean Carroll’s defamation lawsuit go away. As the New York Timesreported, those efforts are off to a bad start.
